ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Bard Speed (was Charm and damage/hate lists)
ygData.msgSnippet: Well, fastest asside from GM s ;) Spirit of Norrath is also known as GM Run 1 There are GM Run 1 through 9 ;) GM Run 9 is rediculously fast.  EHEHE I
ygData.messageBody:
Well, fastest asside from GM's ;)

Spirit of Norrath is also known as "GM Run 1"
There are GM Run 1 through 9 ;)

GM Run 9 is rediculously fast. EHEHE I remember when me and Daegarmo raced
(when I was a senior guide) I used SoN and he used GM Run 6. I didn't even
"See" him go by ;)

Lyrnia Jongleur
----- Original Message -----
From: "JasonF" <jasonf@...>
To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
Sent: Wednesday, March 15, 2000 1:10 PM
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Bard Speed (was Charm and damage/hate lists)


> From: "JasonF" <jasonf@...>
>
> Hey speaking of running away like a frightened schoolgirl; I learned last
> night that I can handily outrun Shadowed Men now. At 48th with Selo's
Drums
> of March I absolutely blew their doors off. I was watching in third
person
> to see by how much I was outrunning them and it was embarrassing. I
smoked
> 'em.
>
> It's my understanding that SM have "Spirrit of Norrath" speed on them, and
> if that is in fact the case it means that I and other bards equally
equipped
> are the fastest things in the game by a fairly wide margin.
>
> [48 Bard] Crier (Half Elf) <Seekers of Norrath> ZONE: work
>
>
> > Heh. :) You just have to know how to get away if you're
> > forced to zone.
> >
> > --
> > John H. Kim
> > kim@...
>
